mapper.select: SELECT a.`id`, a.`staff_id`, a.`commodity_id`, a.`section_id`, a.`station_id`, a.`sub_id`, a.`conversion_time`, a.`active`,s.staff_name as staff_name,b.commodity_name as commodity_name,b.commodity_img as commodity_img,l.station_name as station_name,w.subcontractors_name as sub_name FROM `smart_site`.`conversion` a INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`staff` s ON a.`staff_id`=s.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`commodity` b ON a.`commodity_id`=b.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`station` l ON a.`station_id`=l.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`subcontractors` w ON a.`sub_id`=w.`id` WHERE a.`section_id`=#{section_id} limit #{page},#{pageSize}

SELECT a.`id`, a.`staff_id`, a.`commodity_id`, a.`section_id`, a.`station_id`, a.`sub_id`, a.`conversion_time`, a.`active`,s.staff_name as staff_name,b.commodity_name as commodity_name,b.commodity_img as commodity_img,l.station_name as station_name,w.subcontractors_name as sub_name FROM `smart_site`.`conversion` a INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`staff` s ON a.`staff_id`=s.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`commodity` b ON a.`commodity_id`=b.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`station` l ON a.`station_id`=l.`id` INNER JOIN `smart_site`.`subcontractors` w ON a.`sub_id`=w.`id` WHERE a.`section_id`=#{section_id} and a.`staff_id`=#{staff_id} limit #{page},#{pageSize}
